title: Permanent Ban!
body:
Hello everybody!!! good morning!!, i got permanently ban yesterday and i think that riot is so so wrong for the ban i improved greatly since my 2 week ban and i was rewarded with nothing, i said GJ and HLGF every game and they still didn't give me my honor back or do anything to show i was improving, and then one game my brother gets on my account and accidentally makes people mad and then they report me and i get permabann, this is unfair i should be given another chance considering I've improved greatly since my 2 week ban and theirs nothing to show for it on their part.
 
p.s i did not know my brother would get on my laptop.

THANK YOU FOR READING LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU THINK.

replies.body: A 2 week suspension is a final warning, so anything even minor could put you at the end of the[ Instant Feedback System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) resulting in a ban.  Looking at your account, the chat being used was very severe and zero tolerance.  You can hit up our player behavior team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request an appeal, but there's no guarantee that I can make to you.

how would i request an appeal? and i agree my brother said some pretty harsh words, although it could have been worse. i am wondering how long after your 2 week ban do you go back to normal account where one hiccup doesn't perma ban you... i wish someone would have specified this to me when i got my 2 week ban, this is where riot needs more communication.

Hit up our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make your request.  Once you're on a 2 week, it's going to take a pretty long time and need to show consistent reform.  There's no gauge to track your standing, we wouldn't want players to abuse this to pick and choose when to be negative towards each other.  Good luck!

Thank you! and yes i agree that would be bad, i am just asking for players who are already close to permaban maybe to just keep giving them notifications that they cannot be toxic, like in-game messages when the game starts or something, i would not have got this account ban, because i learned to not speak back to others unless you have something good to say.

>they still didn't give me my honor back or do anything to show i was improving

You very likely weren't improving then.

>one game my brother gets on my account and accidentally makes people mad and then they report me and i get permabann

Your account security is your responsibility. If you willfully or through neglect or negligence allow someone to play games on your account, you become responsible for any actions they take while on your account. If you did not have a strong password that would have prevented him from guessing it, that's your fault.

>considering I've improved greatly since my 2 eek ban and theirs nothing to show for it on their part.

If you had improved, you would've been increasing in honor progress. 

----
Your 14 day ban was about 2 months ago - a time frame in which most players would've advanced an honor level if they had been improving their behavior. This is what leads me to believe that your behavior was likely not improved since your 14 day ban. Keep in mind that all valid reports will count against your honor progress - even if you aren't punished for them or notified of them.
Can you link me the site in riot where you got this I just got out of a 14 day ban and now I'm scared shitless that anyone who reports me even if I dont say a singlr word will result in a ban

As long as you're not using chat to cause negative experiences towards others, reports won't mean anything.  If necessary you can use /mute all or drag chat off your screen, just be wary that anything you say can be seen by others still.  Our[ Instant Feedback Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) can offer more info about the escalation path.
yea i did not know about /mute all or that you could drag the chat off of the screen, and i disagree because i was not negative and then one game and i get permanent ban, maybe it was an accident?
ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚I didn't know mute all or mute was a command I could even do thanks a lot

No it takes about 2 months to unlock your honor once it becomes locked, and i do believe i improved greatly, i do not get mad at others anymore and i know its hard to believe because of my account rep, but i tell people GJ every game, i did that for 4 weeks straight after my 2 week ban, and believe me i thought i was going to unlock my honor too but i didn't, which is another reason why i believe either it was glitched or it takes 8 weeks to unlock said honor level again but of course being reset to 1.

and i have a VERY VERY strong password on my account, the problem was i was logged in when i went to work, so he had access to my room, i completely forgot about my previous 2 week ban and that it was that important not to let someone on my account. theirs no reason why that should give me a permanent ban, it's different if i was letting someone use my account and gave them my information.

This is simply untrue. It takes a week or two of active play to "unlock" honor, and about 2 months to increase in an honor level.

If it took you 2 whole months of active play, and you didn't get the "unlock" honor message until after 2 months, that's a good sign that you were not behaving properly.

You *may* have a chance to claim "I didn't do it" if you talk to support in a ticket, but as this is due to your own negligence (leaving your account logged in on a computer others had access to), they may not be willing to make an exception here.

yes i agree with you, i work a lot so i was only playing 1-2 games a day, so i guess it would take 2x as long for me... i wish i would have been playing more and then maybe i wouldn't have been ban for one hiccup.

hi iFarm i'm sorry to hear this happened... i don't like they're report system, people get reported for no reason over half of the time, it definitely needs to be fixed, i think everyone not just those who are reported should be reviewed after a game is over, and i also agree that you should be unban because how would you ever improve if they do not tell you that you are doing better. or work with you, at-least they should message you saying if your improving your 2 week ban status or doing worse, that way you actually know whats happening lol

i agree hitman they should message me letting me know if i have been improving or doing worse before they perma ban me, also it was 100% not my fault i had no idea my brother was going to go in my room and get on my laptop.
Hello iFarm, i think that you are right, i think that after a 2 week ban if you improve, they should change your status, or else how would they know you are improving.

i also agree, they should add some way to show improvement after a 2 week ban, maybe they can unban you because you didn't know your brother had your information. HOPE IT ALL WORKS OUT!!!

:)
